subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=|rs=囗00}}

# the "[[country]]" radical, called {{ja-r|国%構|くに%がまえ}}

subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
As a radical and variant kanji for {{m|ja|国|t=country}}:
{{ja-readings
|goon=こく
|kanon=こく
|kun=くに-, くにがまえ-<くにがまへ-
|nanori=
}}
As a variant kanji for {{m|ja|囲|t=to surround/encircle}}:
{{ja-readings
|goon=え<ゑ ‎
|kanon=い<ゐ
|kun=かこ-む
|nanori=
}}
